key_features: Unlimited access to 1,300 airport lounges worldwide, for you and a guest
Earn 2.4 air miles per S$1 spent in foreign currency, and 1.4 air miles per S$1 spent locally
Bonus 15,000 air miles upon renewal with min. S$100,000 spend in membership year
Complimentary welcome drinks and up to 50% off at Michelin-starred and fine dining restaurants
Travel with a peace of mind with up to S$1,000,000 Travel Personal Accident Insurance coverage
24/7 UOB Visa Infinite Concierge for your banking and lifestyle needs
air_miles: Earn 2.4 air miles per S$1 spent in foreign currency and 1.4 air miles per S$1 spent locally
Bonus 15,000 air miles upon renewal with min. S$100,000 spend in membership year
overseas_spending: Earn 2.4 air miles per S$1 spent in foreign currency (Overseas or Online)
petrol: Up to 14% off at Shell and up to 20% off at SPC
entertainment: Complimentary weekday green fees at Sentosa Golf Club with 1 fee paying guest
dining: Complimentary welcome drinks at Michelin-starred and top restaurants locally and overseas
Up to 50% discount at participating restaurants from Pan Pacific Hotels Group, The Fullerton Hotels Singapore, The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore and Sheraton Towers Singapore

fees.supplementary_card_fee: First Supplementary Card: Free for life. S$293.38 (inclusive of 9% GST) for second and subsequent card(s)
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of current balance or $50, whichever is higher, plus any overdue amounts
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of cash advance amount subject to min. S$15

minimum_income.singaporean_pr: Singaporean/PR Minimum Income Minimum annual income of S$120,000 is required
minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income Minimum annual income of S$120,000 is required
